resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_title
string-array.item: "Technical Hotline Now Available from Outside Germany"
"TAN Hotline Now Available from Outside Germany"

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "In addition to the results of PCR tests, you can now also display the results of rapid antigen tests in the app and use them to warn others."

"If you want, you can use the app to prove your personal infection status (a negative rapid test, for example). Please note, however, that you are under no obligation to use the app to prove your infection status. You can also prove your infection status in another manner compliant with the legal regulations at your residence."
"You can now reach the technical hotline from outside Germany as well, under the number +49 30 498 75401. The fees from your telephone provider will apply."
"If you are diagnosed with coronavirus, you can now request a TAN from outside Germany, under the number +49 30 498 75402. The fees from your telephone provider will apply."
